name: RUN FOR THE SUN
description:
- IT'S MAKE IT OR BREAK IT! - In this game, you take control of Sunny Seed, a sunflower seed who mysteriously wakes up at the bottom of a ditch. From the moment they become conscious they have the irresistible urge to make it to the sun and grow, grow, grow! To help them in their task, you'll use Sunny's roots to push and pull yourself around and climb as high as possible. Sunny's purpose is simple: to flourish and become one with nature. - CONTROLS - Mouse - Aim
Left mouse click / Keyboard Q - Pull roots
Right mouse click / Keyboard W - Push roots
Middle mouse click / Keyboard E - Hang roots - CREDITS - George - Programming, Level design, UI
Jordan - Music, Sound effects, Programming
Elijah - Programming, UI
Julien - Programming, Level design
Keven - Art, Level design
 ... SIDE NOTE: This game was originally made for GLOBAL GAME JAM 2023! The project was never submitted, but over time, the game was polished and released here; for you to play! Also if you think you're REAL speedy, be sure to comment your best times!
